 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁגַע‎</span>] **Pu\`al** ==be mad== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> coo, of male pigeon, ***utter long whinny***, of camel (compare [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]]<sup>ZAW iii (1883), 89</sup> [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>JPhil. Xiv. 119 f.</sup> Goldziher<sup>Arab. Philol. i. 59 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 202</sup>); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be mad*** (***n*** insert, [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>1055</sup> [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 50</sup>); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šegû, rage, howl;***</u></abbr> on meaning in Hebrew see especially [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii. 130</sup>); — 

**Pu\`al** ***Participle*** as adjective : predicate <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהָיִיתָ מְשֻׁגָּע‎</span> [[Deut.28.34|Deut 28:34]] ***thou shalt be maddened*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> because of), figurative for driven to despair; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> of prophets, contemptuously [[Hos.9.7|Hos 9:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלאִֿישׁ מ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמִתְנַבֵּא‎</span> [[Jer.29.26|Jer 29:26]], as substantive [[2Kgs.9.11|2Kgs 9:11]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשֻׁגָּעִים‎</span> [[1Sam.21.16|1Sam 21:16]] ***madmen***. **Hithpa\`el** ***shew madness; Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ מִשְׁתַּגֵּעַ‎</span> [[1Sam.21.15|1Sam 21:15]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהִשְׁתַּגֵּעַ‎</span> v.[[1Sam.21.16|1Sam 21:16]].
